attributes.action: make it compulsory for CPR and first aid in schools
attributes.additional_details: to have kids in primary schools learn how to cope with a medical emergency like what to do who to call for help and in secondary schools to learn CPR wound care and the recovery position how to help with  choking and learn when some one is having a heart attack.as there are times in and out of schools with parents & siblings or just being in the right place at the right time this can save lives and i think it should be taught once a month in schools and make it a reward system so that kids would want to learn .these lessons are with you the rest of your life once learned you will never forget !
